concept.title: L2 memory system
concept.shortdesc: The L2 memory system services L1 instruction and data cache misses from the Cortexâ€‘A76 core.

ul.li: An 8-way set associative L2 cache with data ECC protection per 64 bits. The L2 cache is configurable with sizes of 128KB, 256KB, or 512KB.
An interface with the DSU configurable at implementation time for synchronous or asynchronous operation.
